homeWelcome: Vyapar Sahayak mein aapka swagat hai!
homeTagline: Aapki dukaan ko acche se manage karne ke liye best jagah.
productOutOfStockFull: {name} ab stock se khatam ho gaya hai.
isOutOfStock: stock se khatam ho gaya hai.
productFormMinStockThresholdPlaceholder: Jaise, 5 (global istemal hoga agar khali hai)
productFormMinStockThresholdHint: Global threshold istemal karne ke liye khali chhodein. Stock khatam hone par hi alert ke liye 0 set karein.
productNotFoundError: Samaan ID '{id}' ke saath nahi mila.
productAddedDescription: {name} aapki inventory mein safaltapoorvak add ho gaya hai.
confirmDeleteDescription: Kya aap pakka is samaan ko delete karna chahte hain? Yeh action undo nahi hoga.
productFormUpdateDetails: Apne samaan ki details update karein.
productFormAddNewToInventory: Apni inventory mein naya samaan jodein.
adjustSearchOrFilter: Apni search ya filter ko adjust karein.
addNewProductToGetStarted: Shuru karne ke liye naya samaan jodein.
generateBillSearchPlaceholder: Samaan search karke bill mein add karein...
generateBillCartEmpty: Aapka cart khali hai. Shuru karne ke liye samaan add karein.
billSummaryDetailsBelow: Generated bill ki details neeche hain.
suggestedItemsError: Suggestions load nahi ho paye. Kripya baad mein koshish karein.
settingsLanguageDescription: Apni pasand ki application bhasha chunein.
settingsThemeDescription: Apni pasand ki application theme chunein.
settingsGlobalThresholdDescription: Jab koi bhi samaan (bina specific threshold ke) is quantity se neeche jaye toh alert karein.
settingsGlobalThresholdUpdated: Global low stock threshold {threshold} par update ho gaya hai.
settingsInvalidThresholdError: Galat threshold value. Kripya non-negative number daalein.
settingsPerProductOverrideNote: Har samaan ka apna minimum stock threshold product editing page par set kiya ja sakta hai, jo is global setting ko override karega.
settingsNotificationsEnableDescription: Control karein ki aap stock alerts, bill generation, etc. ke liye pop-up notifications dekhein ya nahi.
udhaarKhataDescription: Apne credits aur debts manage karein.
udhaarKhataAddDescription: Apne khate mein naya credit ya debit entry jodein.
udhaarKhataEditDescription: Maujooda khata entry ki details badlein.
udhaarKhataNoEntries: Koi udhaar entry nahi mili. Shuru karne ke liye add karein!
udhaarKhataNoPayableEntries: Aapko koi rakam nahi deni. Sab clear hai!
udhaarKhataNoReceivableEntries: Aapko koi rakam nahi leni. Sab chukta hai!
udhaarEntryAddedDescription: {name} ke liye nayi entry safaltapoorvak save ho gayi.
udhaarEntryUpdatedDescription: {name} ke liye entry safaltapoorvak update ho gayi.
udhaarEntryDeletedDescription: {name} ke liye entry safaltapoorvak delete ho gayi.
udhaarEntryNotFoundError: ID '{id}' wali khata entry nahi mili.
udhaarSaveErrorGeneral: Entry save karte samay anpekshit error.
confirmDeleteDescriptionUdhaar: Kya aap pakka {name} (Amount: ₹{amount}) ki khata entry delete karna chahte hain? Yeh action undo nahi hoga.
sttDialogPromptMessage: Bolne ke liye mic button dabayein.
sttDialogMicNotSupportedError: Aapka browser speech recognition support nahi karta.
sttDialogMicPermissionErrorDescription: Microphone access mana kar diya gaya hai. Voice command istemal karne ke liye browser settings mein ise enable karein.
sttDialogNoSpeechError: Koi awaaz nahi sunai di. Kripya dobara koshish karein.
sttDialogAudioCaptureError: Audio capture mein error. Apna microphone check karein.
sttDialogNetworkError: Speech recognition ke dauran network error. Apna connection check karein.
sttDialogDefaultError: Speech recognition ke dauran error. Kripya dobara koshish karein.
sttPremiumFeatureDescription: Yeh voice command execution feature premium hai aur abhi available nahi hai. Kripya manual input ka istemal karein.
chatbotErrorFetchingData: Chatbot ke liye data fetch karne mein error.
chatbotNoResponse: Main aapke sawaal ke liye taiyaar hoon. Upar di gayi list se chunne ki koshish karein.
chatbotResponseNotDirectlyActionable: Is tarah ke kaam ke liye, कृपया app ka main interface istemal karein.
chatbotNoPendingDues: Kisi ka bhi udhaar baaki nahi hai.
chatbotSelectProductStockTitle: Stock check karne ke liye samaan chunein:
chatbotNoProductsForStock: Check karne ke liye koi samaan available nahi.
chatbotCommandNotUnderstood: Maaf kijiye, main yeh command samajh nahi paya. Kripya list se chunein ya alag shabdon mein puchein.
cannotAddMoreThanStock: Stock mein {name} se zyada add nahi kar sakte.
emptyCartDescription: Bill banane se pehle cart mein samaan add karein.
noProductsMatchYourSearch: Aapki search se koi samaan match nahi hua.
searchForProductsToAdd: Add karne ke liye samaan search karein.
profilePageDescription: Apni profile details dekhein aur manage karein.
profileNoActivity: Koi haal ki activity nahi hai.
profileUpdateSuccessDescription: Aapki profile safaltapoorvak update ho gayi hai.
profileChangePasswordDescription: Password badalne ki suvidha jald hi uplabdh hogi.
profileErrorDescription: Hum aapki profile information load nahi kar paaye. Kripya dobara koshish karein.
profileErrorRetry: Dobara Load Karne Ki Koshish Karein
profileEditDialogDescription: Apna naam aur email address update karein.
profileAvatarUpdateSuccessDescription: Aapki profile picture safaltapoorvak update ho gayi hai.
profileAvatarUpdateErrorDescription: Profile picture update nahi ho saki. Kripya dobara koshish karein.
profileAvatarFileErrorGeneric: Chuni gayi file mein koi samasya thi.
profileAvatarFileErrorNotImage: Aमान्य file type. Kripya ek image chunein.
profileAvatarFileErrorTooLarge: File bahut badi hai. Adhiktam size {maxSize} hai.
storageUnknownHint: Yeh aam taur par Firebase Storage configuration mein samasya dikhata hai, jaise ki storage bucket URL aapke environment variables mein sahi tarah se set nahi hai ya Firebase project setup mein koi galti hai. Kripya .env file mein apna NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET check karein aur server restart karein.
errorLoadingUdhaarEntriesTitle: Udhaar Entries Load Karne Mein Error
historyErrorLoadingBills: Bill history load nahi ho saki.
historyErrorGeneralDescription: Hum bill history load nahi kar paaye. Kripya dobara koshish karein.
historyLoadingBills: Bill history load ho rahi hai...
historyNoBillsFoundDescription: Jab aap bill banayenge, woh yahan dikhenge.
phoneNumberInvalidLengthDescription: Agar phone number daala gaya hai to woh theek 10 anko ka hona chahiye.
premiumDialogDescription: Features compare karein aur dekhein Premium kya offer karta hai.
premiumDialogVoiceCommandsBasic: Sirf text dictate karein; command execution band.
premiumDialogVoiceCommandsPremium: Voice se app actions execute karein.
premiumDialogProfilePicturesPremium: Apna custom avatar upload aur display karein.
premiumDialogItemPicturesPremium: Custom product images upload aur display karein.
premiumDialogAdvancedAnalyticsPremium: Gehri sales reports aur trend analysis.
contactForInquiries: Kisi bhi poochhtaachh, support, ya feedback ke liye, kripya neeche diye gaye developer details dekhein.
contactMoreOptionsComingSoon: Aur contact options jald hi uplabdh honge.
